description: This file defines a React component named ExportPdfButton, which provides a UI button to trigger PDF export functionality for a referenced element or a CSS selector. It imports utility functions for PDF export, handles user interaction and visual feedback, and manages various props for configuration.

methods.name: exportPdfButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button to trigger PDF export of a target element or selector, with configurable filename, label, and callback.
